text:
SUVAYU CHAKRABORTY
Mobile:+91 8582834626/+919875547543 Email: schakrabortypmcrc@gmail.com  
RES : 10A SREENATH GHOSE SARANI, KONNAGAR, HOOGHLY, PIN 712235, WEST BENGAL
PRESENT ADDRESS: RIYADH, SAUDI ARAB
Seeking challenging assignments with a growth oriented and fast track organization,
utilizing acquired skills and experience to contribute towards the development of the
Company, demanding high standards of quality and precision
Meticulous  &  knowledgeable  B.  Tech  (Electronics  &  Instrumentation)  professional
offering 7.5 years of experience teamed with excellent domain knowledge
Currently associate with  NATIONAL FACTORY OF  GLASS BOTTLE “ZOUJAJ” , Riyadh ,
Saudi  Arab   as  Head  of  the  department  –  Instrumentation  &  Electrical  since
August’2016
Previously associate with  HINDUSTHAN NATIONAL GLASS  INDUSTRIES LMT  (HNGIL) As
SR. Engineer from Feb’2013 to June 2016
 Previously  associated with  PMC Rubber Chemical India Pvt. Limited as an Electrical &
Instrument Officer (Maintenance) From June’ 2011 to Jan ‘2013
Adroit at maintaining Relay Logic, PLC, DCS, SCADA, Field Instruments, VFD etc.
Profound knowledge of gathering & analyzing business requirement documents, functional
specification document and propose changes as per various internal/external requirements for
process improvement
Expertise in areas like maintenance of machines, planning & scheduling the work and work
force during breakdown, cost management, inspecting/quality check, etc.
Hands-on  experience  in  training  employees  on  safety  and  newly  implemented  operating
procedures
Skilled in translating business requirements into functional and non-functional requirements
Adaptable, out of the box thinker with a goal to establish long lasting relationship with the
organization
Extensive industry knowledge; keen client needs assessment aptitude; client focused approach
that fosters trust and allegiance; highly trustworthy, ethical and discreet
CAREER RELATED SKILLS
Preventive, Break down and shutdown maintenance
Problem Analysis & Resolution
Documentation
Energy Management
Procurement Management
Business & Leadership Reviews
CAREER GRAPH
Head of the department – Instrumentation & Electrical at NATIONAL FACTORY OF GLASS
BOTTLE “ZOUJAJ”, Riyadh , Saudi Arab   since August’2016
Instrument  Sr. Engineer at HINDUSTHAN NATIONAL GLASS INDUSTRIES LTD from Feb ’13 to
July’16
Electrical & Instrument Officer at PMC Rubber Chemical India Pvt Limited, Rishra  from
June’11 to Jan’13
Deliverables
GLASS INDUSTRY :
Adept in managing all over running maintenance, shutdown & preventive maintenance, motor,
VFD, drives and other core electrical devices
Maintenance of furnace (Gas , Oil & petroleum coke ), maximum capacity of 400 ton glass
manufactured by  Horn , besides accustoms with furnace made by  Swarg, TECH GLASS.
Breakdown, shutdown maintenance of PLC based fully automated furnace with SCADA system.
Adjusting  and  maintenance  of  LASER  type  glass  level  sensor,  control  valve,  actuators,
modification of logic, relay logics and other logic related problems are in the scope of the job
Maintenance of Batch plant of flint glass and colored glass (green, amber) manufactured by
Zippi, also has profound knowledge of EME made batch plant.
Maintenance and temperature control of forehearth and distributor manufactured by Emhart
Glass & Tech Glass
Profound knowledge on Individual Section machine Bottero spv400 , Bottero spv700 with
servo mechanism & Emhart  E-flexis  with and without FPS, hand held experience in PPC
technology. Communication, installation of Jetter drive, Lenze Drive, strobe driver sync control
By EFRA technology, Maintenance on Pennikemp and revimac stacker  .
Maintenance  of  Lehr including  gas  fired  burner  of  Pennikemp,  Bowman,  Karmet  &
Antohini 
Maintainace of Hot End Coating Machine ( IMACA ) & Cold End Coating Machine 
Inspection Machine  operation & maintenance of  SGCC, MX4, ATLAS, MULTI3,MULTI4,
MULTI P, MCAL P manufactured by TIAMA
Maintenance and modification of  packing machine (logicon), Palletizer (MSK), Single
line control (MSK), shink wrapping machine (THIMON & MSK), Pallet Dressing &
shuttle car (MSK)
Calibration  &  maintenance  of  Quality  instrument  like  RPT  ,  RPT  2,  Tilting  Machine,
HCMS,FCMS manufactured by AGR
ISO training and implementation 9001:2008, 22001:4001, HPPAC
CHEMICAL INDUSTRY :
Maintenance of  field  instruments including RTD, Thermocouple, Pressure  Gauge, Pressure
Transmitter,  Vacuum  Transmitter,  various  types  of  Flowmeter,  different  types  of  level
indicator, Control Valve, Compressor, different Switch, Weight Machine, Safety Device, I/P, P/I,
SOV, Controller, Indicator, Recorder, various types of proxy, pyrometer etc.
Calibration of field instruments using dead weight tester, temp bath and other calibrated
instrument
Maintenance of service unit – Burner (Oil Filled, gas filled) Super Heater, Hydrogen Plant,
Compressor, SFD, etc.
Comprehensive knowledge on Wincc Manager, citec scada
Involved in ladder logic design for Packing Machine, Hydrogen Plant
Effective at handling Relay Logic Design, Ladder Logic Design, Troublesome of PLC & DCS
Hand held experience on Ethernet, Profibus DP, fieldbus foundation
Active involvement in Procurement – selecting material, maintaining ERP & SAP, and dealing
vendors
Responsible for documentation for ISO 9001:2008 & 14001:2004
Project Summary
Hydrogen Plant C30 Unit for 1 year
1st C30 Unit in India,produces 30 M3/HR Hydrogen
Pestilattor for 1.5 years
Production of ZC Pestil
Husk Boiler, 8 Ton for 8 months
Production of 17 Kg/CM2 Pressure and Superheated Stream
SCHOLASTICS
SECONDARY (GENERAL) in WBBSE in 2005; MARKS: 88.87%
HIGHIER SECONDARY (SCIENCE) in WBCHSE in 2007; MARKS: 75.07%B. Tech (Electronics & Instrumentation) from WBUT in 2011; DGPA 7.67
Academic Attainments
Qualified GATE and AIR 1412 in 2012

Trained on AutoCAD 2D & 3D from CMC for 4 months in 2013
Attended training on Driyer Optimization from ITC Limited for 1 month in 2010
Training on Simatic Manager (s7 400), RS Logic, wincc from STQC, Govt OF INDIA
Extramural Engagements
Participated in “Kshitij’09”, IIT Kharagpur in Robotics
PERSONAL DOSSIER
